name: hopVizLoopHistogramWebble
description:
The Hands-on Portal Life Table visualization Webble shows data in a histogram and can automatically change the selected subset of data to give you a kind of movie of visualizations of different subsets of data.

The Webble expects data to be provided by a Hands-on Portal data Webble, for example the hopFileDataWebble.

To change various options, right-click on the Webble and select "Properties".
keywords: Digital Dashboard, Hands-on Portal, hop, dashboardTNG, visualization, viz
author: digitalDashboardTNG
